Reynolds_number.description: Reynolds number. It is referred to fuselage length

Wing_Aspect_Ratio.description: Wing Aspect Ratio. Accepts values in [6,14] range.

Wing_position.description: Between -1 and +1. Low wing = -1; high wing = 1

Vertical_Tail_Aspect_Ratio.description: Vertical Tail Aspect Ratio. Accepts values in [1,2] range.

Vertical_Tail_Arm.description: Distance of the AC of the vertical tail MAC from the MAC/4 point of the wing

Vertical_Tail_Sweep_at_half_chord.description: Vertical Tail sweep at half chord.

Vertical_tail_airfoil_lift_curve_slope.description: Vertical tail airfoil lift curve slope.

Horizontal_position_over_vertical.description: Relative position of the horizontal tail over the vertical tail span, computed from a reference line. Must be in [0,1] range

NoseFinenessRatio.description: "Nose fineness ratio is the ratio between nose fuselage length and maximum fuselage diameter. It varies between [1.2-1.7]"

FinenessRatio.description: "Fuselage fineness ratio is the ratio between fuselage length and diameter. It varies between [7-12]"

TailFinenessRatio.description: "Tailcone fineness ratio is the ratio between tailcone fuselage length and maximum fuselage diameter. It varies between [2.3-3.0]"

WindshieldAngle.description: "Windshield angle is the angle of the front window. It varies between [35 deg - 50 deg]"

UpsweepAngle.description: "Upsweep angle is the upward curvature angle of the aft fuselage. It varies between [10 deg - 18 deg]"

xPercentPositionPole.description: "xPercentPositionPole is the position along x-axis of the reference moment point. It can be equal to 0.35, 0.50 or 0.60 which corresponds to 35%, 50% or 60% of fuselage length respectively"

WingSweepAngle.description: "Sweep angle of the wing computed with respect to c/4 line"

xACwMACratio.description: "Ratio between the x-position of the wing aerodynamic center and the mean aerodynamic chord"

xCGMACratio.description: "Ratio between the x-position of the center of gravity and the mean aerodynamic chord"

KFv_vs_bv_over_dfv.description: Aerodynamic interference factor of the fuselage on the vertical tail as a function of the ratio of the vertical tail span over the fuselage diameter taken at the aerodynamic center on the MAC of the vertical tail

KHf_vs_zh_over_bv1.description: Interference factor of the horizontal tail on the fuselage

KHv_vs_zh_over_bv1.description: Interference factor of the horizontal tail on the vertical tail

KVf_vs_bv_over_dfv.description: Interference factor of the vertical tail on the fuselage

KWf_vs_zw_over_rf.description: Interference factor of the wing on the fuselage

KWv_vs_zw_over_rf.description: Interference factor of the wing on the vertical tail

CN_beta_vertical.description: Yawing moment coefficient derivative, vertical tail contribution

CNb_FR_vs_FR.description: "Yawing moment derivative coefficient as function of fuselage fineness ratio"

dCNb_nose_vs_FRn.description: "Yawing moment nose correction factor. It depends on the nose fineness ratio"

dCNb_tail_vs_FRt.description: "Yawing moment tail correction factor. It depends on the tailcone fineness ratio."

CNb_fuselage.description: "Fuselage Yawing Moment Derivative Coefficient estimated with FusDes method"
